page.title: 06St. Mary's C.E., Coven Heath
page.content: St Mary's church Coven Heath is a mission church which is part of the Parish of Bushbury.It is a very tiny church and has about 12 members they are all elderly but they come every Sunday for the service at three thirty pm. There is no Sunday school at the church but there is another service on a Sunday at ten thirty am and everyone joins in with that.the Parish caters for old and young people they run an over 60's club for old people every wednesday two thirty pm to four fifteen pm.The services at the church are certainly very interesting there is a robed choir and an organ and thats not all! There is also flutes guitars and sometimes tambourines.The churches own dance group sometimes lead the worship as well.The church also runs weeknight clubs like climbing exploring and pathfinding.
